description: It's Thanksgiving and you're looking for the best cocktails to make? Look no further than Bloody Mary Shots! This drink is an&nbsp;appetizer in one, with its rich tomato juice base, spicy horseradish kick, and salty rim. It can be served as a shot or drink-in-a-glass. Give it a try this year on your family's Thanksgiving table!
name: Bloody Mary Shots
